summary:
KPMG is a large British company that provides professional services like accounting and business advice. It's one of the biggest in the world, often called a "Big Four" company. The name comes from the companies that merged to form KPMG in 1987. 

They have offices in 145 countries with many employees. KPMG offers three main services: checking financial records (audit), tax advice, and business advice. Sometimes, KPMG has faced legal issues in different countries.
title: KPMG
